trans-unit.source: Changes planning data with immediate effect.

seg-source.mrk: Changes planning data with immediate effect.

trans-unit.source: Via this mode you can make immediate changes to the planning data of a product allocation object, for example, change quantities or change the constraint status.

seg-source.mrk: Via this mode you can make immediate changes to the planning data of a product allocation object, for example, change quantities or change the constraint status.

target.mrk: 이 모드에서는 제품 할당 오브젝트의 계획 데이터를 즉시 변경할 수 있습니다(예: 수량 변경 또는 제약 상태 변경).

trans-unit.source: There is no <uicontrol>Save</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Cancel</uicontrol> function. Changes via the <uicontrol>Quick Edit</uicontrol> mode are immediately visible for the product allocation check and do not create a draft version of the data.

seg-source.mrk: Changes via the <uicontrol>Quick Edit</uicontrol> mode are immediately visible for the product allocation check and do not create a draft version of the data.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>빠른 편집</uicontrol> 모드를 통한 변경사항은 제품 할당 점검에 즉시 표시되며 데이터의 드래프트 버전을 생성하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If another user is editing the same characteristic value combination in parallel via the regular Edit mode and a draft version of the planning data has been created, the <uicontrol>Quick Edit</uicontrol> mode will not available as long as the lock for the draft exists.

seg-source.mrk: If another user is editing the same characteristic value combination in parallel via the regular Edit mode and a draft version of the planning data has been created, the <uicontrol>Quick Edit</uicontrol> mode will not available as long as the lock for the draft exists.

target.mrk: 다른 사용자가 일반 편집 모드를 통해 동일한 특징 값 조합을 병렬로 편집하고 있고 계획 데이터의 드래프트 버전이 생성된 경우, 드래프트의 잠금이 해제되기 전까지는 <uicontrol>빠른 편집</uicontrol> 모드를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can leave the <uicontrol>Quick Edit</uicontrol> mode via the <uicontrol>Display</uicontrol> button, the global <uicontrol>Edit</uicontrol> button or by leaving the screen.

seg-source.mrk: You can leave the <uicontrol>Quick Edit</uicontrol> mode via the <uicontrol>Display</uicontrol> button, the global <uicontrol>Edit</uicontrol> button or by leaving the screen.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>빠른 편집</uicontrol> 모드를 종료하려면 <uicontrol>조회</uicontrol> 버튼 또는 글로벌 <uicontrol>편집</uicontrol> 버튼을 사용하거나 화면에서 나오면 됩니다.
